job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Government Relations,Architecture & Planning
job.description:
Job Title: Machine Learning EngineerDuration: 12+ Months Contract with possible extension Location: 100% remote &lt;Work from home role&gt;   NOT OPEN FOR JUNIOR OR ENTRY LEVEL - MORE THAN 8 YEAR'S OF EXPERICNE REQUIRED &nbsp;   Key Skills:  - Development of predictive models and analytics   
  - Data cleansing and shaping   
  - Break/fix support and retraining of models   
  - Advisory during ongoing design efforts of future rollouts   
  - Skillset – Python, Jupyter Notebook, XGBoost, SKLearn   
  - Would consider contract-to-hire; supporting one particular project, but able to expand role into other client initiatives   
  - US-based; Houston local a plus   
  - Remote work is acceptable   
      Note: If interested please email me your resume at anil.chamoli@mastechdigital.com or call me at 973-922-1844.   Best Regards,Anil ChamoliLead Recruiter973-922-1844Anil.Chamoli@mastechdigital.comwww.mastechdigital.com
